title: Implement dependency type management
description: Support dependency types: blocks (must complete before), related (soft connection), discovered-from (traceability chain). Ensure proper dependency resolution for ready work.

title: Implement Builder agent role
description: Create Builder agent with full read/write permissions. Focus: implementation, bug fixes, features. Constraints: no bulk operations like git add -A, conventional commits required, IRC announcements for significant actions. Color: Green.

title: Create session recovery mechanism
description: Address CONTINUE vulnerability: implement automated session recovery using Beads state reconstruction. Restore context from persisted issues when session terminates unexpectedly.

title: Set up FIFO infrastructure for CONTINUE
description: Create Unix named pipes (FIFOs) for inter-process communication. Set up project-scoped namespace isolation in /tmp with proper permissions.
close_reason: Implemented FIFO manager script and configuration

title: Implement Observer agent role
description: Create Observer agent with read-only code access, write observations. Focus: analysis, patterns, documentation. Maintain objectivity in analysis. Color: Blue.

title: Implement real-time discovery workflow
description: During session: Builder announces discoveries via CONTINUE, creates persistent issues in Beads, broadcasts to team via IRC. Map labels: Builder→implementation/bug/feature, Observer→architecture/documentation/analysis, Meta-Observer→meta/process/monitoring.

title: Create hybrid dashboard
description: Unified dashboard showing: real-time CONTINUE status (agent activity, FIFO health), Beads overview (ready work, blocked issues, dependencies). Support graceful degradation if one component fails.

title: Create persona-based view commands
description: Implement filtered views per persona: Architect sees design specs, Implementer sees tasks, Reviewer sees pending reviews, Product Owner sees customer-facing work.

title: Set up tmux/IRC session management
description: Configure tmux for IRC-style messaging and announcements. Set up dashboard initialization and agent startup procedures.

title: Implement 'Landing the Plane' handoff
description: Session end protocol: Drain CONTINUE channels, update Beads state for all discoveries, run bd sync and git push, generate session summary via Meta-Observer. Ensure no work is lost between sessions.

title: Set up Git hooks for auto-sync
description: Configure pre-commit hooks and merge drivers. Enable JSONL export after CRUD operations (5s debounce). Handle import from JSONL when newer than DB.

title: Implement Meta-Observer agent role
description: Create Meta-Observer agent with read-only system-wide access. Focus: system monitoring, communication tracking. Color: Purple. Generates session summaries.

title: Implement session lifecycle management
description: Handle session lifecycle: Dashboard initialization → Agent startup → Active development → Session handoff (Landing the plane). Include graceful shutdown procedures.

title: Configure persona-based labels for Beads
description: Set up label system for persona filtering: Architect (architecture, epic), Implementer (implementation, bug), Reviewer (review, testing), Product Owner (customer-facing, user-story). Map labels to CONTINUE agents.

title: Multi-Agent Workflow Framework Implementation
description: Implement hybrid multi-agent coordination system combining CONTINUE (synchronous) and Beads (asynchronous) frameworks for AI-assisted software development. Based on research at wal.sh/research/multi-agent-workflow-frameworks.html

title: Implement conflict resolution strategy
description: Handle Beads JSONL merge conflicts from concurrent edits. Implement merge driver, detect DB/JSONL synchronization drift, define conflict resolution procedures.

title: Implement session start integration
description: On session start: Initialize FIFO infrastructure, load Beads context (bd ready), resume in-progress items. Bridge CONTINUE session with Beads state.
